{{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[Ace of Base]] |Image =Ace OF Base Vantaa Finlandia 2-10-2008.JPG |Caption = |Studio = 5 |Studio link = Studio albums |Compilation = 7 |Comp link = Compilation albums |Video = |Video link = |Singles = 24 |Singles link = Singles |Music videos = 18 |MV link = Music videos |B-sides = |B link = |Soundtrack = |Soundtrack link = |References = |Ref link = }} This is the discography of [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[pop music|pop]] group [[Ace of Base]]. The group is the third best-selling group from Sweden after [[ABBA]] and [[Roxette]] with an estimated 30 million {{Cite web|url=http://www.newsdesk.se/pressroom/sennheiser/pressrelease/view/ace-of-base-paa-turne-med-sennheiser-238528 |title=Ace Of Base pÃ¥ turnÃ© med Sennheiser! (Ace of Base on tour with Sennheiser!)|publisher=newsdesk.se|language=Swedish}}{{Cite web|url=http://www.svd.se/kulturnoje/nyheter/artikel_2054771.svd |title=HÃ¤r Ã¤r Ace of Base 3.0 (Here is the Ace of Base 3.0)|publisher=[[Svenska Dagbladet]]|language=Swedish}} album sales and 24 million singles worldwide. This is a list with all of their albums and singles released, along with highest chart positions reached in major territories. Extended chart information, artwork and tracklistings can be found on individual pages. To date, they have released 5 studio albums and 24 singles. == Albums == ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:16em;"| Album details ! scope="col" colspan="10"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| Sales ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:14em;"| [[List of music recording certifications|Certifications]] |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font-size:90%;"| [[Sverigetopplistan|SWE]]
